Name: Queen of the flies 蝇后
About the game: This is a reading game that describes internet life. You can push the plot by clicking on different positions on the screen and pass the customs in 30 minutes. Game play: Click the mouse to trigger different plots by clicking on different positions on the screen, and finally usher in the end of the story. Game content: 1. 15K word plot text, a concise short story. 2. 7 original music, which will change with the advance of the plot. 3. Novel visual novel, all words can interact. 4. A profound core to expose the essence of the Internet to you. Note: 1. This is not a fun game. It can't bring you happiness, and may even bring you pain. 2. This is a game with many words. Before starting the game, please make sure you are used to or good at reading.
Developers: 吃了就睡工作室,夜神说话
